#summary Declaration of static constructors.
<wiki:toc max_depth="3"/>

= Static constructor declaration =
The syntax to declare a static constructor is specified by:
<blockquote><em>
static-constructor-declaration:
    annotations<sub>opt</sub> <tt>static</tt> identifier ( ) block
</em></blockquote>
Static constructors are mapped to the {{{<clinit>}}} JVM method. There is no restriction on {{{final}}} field modifications in constructors.
{{{
class C {
    public final static int Field;
    static C() {
        int i = this.Field; // it is OK because all fields are initialized to 0
        this.Field++; // final field can be modified without restriction
    }
}
}}}
